committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development

official_title: To amend section 105(a)(8) of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to increase the percentage limitation on the amount of community development block grant assistance that may be expended for public services activities.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to increase from 15 percent to 20 percent the limitation on the amount of community development block grant assistance that may be expended for public services activities.

titles.title: To amend section 105(a)(8) of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to increase the percentage limitation on the amount of community development block grant assistance that may be expended for public services activities.
